bullets: Developed a Flask-RESTX API server integrated with a MongoDB database for a messaging app, deployed on a cloud server
Created automated tests for all backend functions and API endpoints, ensuring robust functionality
Designed and implemented an interactive and dynamic React TypeScript interface, ensuring a seamless user experience for sending messages and real-time updates

Parkinson's Disease Tremor Detector.description: We programmed an Adafruit Circuit Playground Classic to detect Parkinson's Disease tremors. The circuit board lights up green to yellow to red as the hand movement frequency nears a specific range.

City Jail App.description: This app allows for data management using mock criminal data. Most of the frontend and backend operations were done with PHP, and it was previously deployed on AWS.

Basic Processor Simulator.description: This is a simulator for an elementary processor called E20. It takes assembly code, translates it to machine code, then finally runs it.
